snippet.title: [Out of Hands] Steam DEMO release trailer
snippet.description:
Attention everyone! "Out of hands" will participate in The INDIE HORROR SHOWCASE on October 24, 2024。New demo is now launched on Steam.
You'll be able to experience the following:
The mainline area of Chapter One, including several explorable scenes!
New weapon cards, new facial organs, new hands, new mechanics, new bosses, and an all-new combat experience!
Can you break through the illusion and see the truth in this never-ending nightmare cycle? Come explore this one-of-a-kind world for yourself!
